overview: Wendy Tung is the User Experience Manager at Ooyala. In those roles she directs all user experience, interactive design and branding efforts and oversees Ooyala’s far-flung creative staff. Wendy is a Silicon Valley veteran with a degree in cognitive science from the University of California, San Diego, where she specialized in human-computer interaction at the Jacobs School of Engineering. In her free time, Wendy is active in the Society of Women Engineers and whipping up new concoctions as an amateur chef.
